name: F-Zero RPG 2: Second Lap
description:
Reupload of this game. This is the full sequel to F-Zero RPG. Now fully stable with no glitches.

Features:

Four playable characters including Falcon, Jody, and 2 iconic Nintendo Characters

Over 150 enemies and bosses

Over 60 unique spells and skills

Upbeat F-Zero Music

Dozens of secrets

F-Zero races

Unlockable boss rush mode

Secret end boss

And more
